Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Arboretum \Ar`bo*re"tum\, n.; pl. {Arboreta}. [L., a place grown with trees.] A place in which a collection of rare trees and shrubs is cultivated for scientific or educational purposes. [1913 Webster]
arboretum n : a facility where trees and shrubs are cultivated for exhibition [syn: {botanical garden}] [also: {arboreta} (pl)]
